page.title: 07Southfield Stables
page.content: The stables have been owned by Mrs Whitehead for 10 years.This year (1985) she has 6 horses and ponies and a donkey.The lesson charges are Â£1.50 for half an hour.The fields that the horses are kept on are owned by a farmer,Wilf Dyer,who also supplies the hay and straw.Mr Ferguson is the vet and Mr N.Dyer from Martock is the farrier.As well as herself Mrs Whitehead employs 2 part_time people to help her with the work.Here are the names of the horses stabled:Fare Weather,Zara,Lion,Pippin,Toby and Cuckoo the donkey.
